translations.translation: and the mountains are crushed
The mountains bruised and crushed,
and the mountains will crumble
and the mountains crumbled,
And the mountains will be crushed, blown to bits.
And the mountains will be powdered to dust,
And the mountains shall be made to crumble with (an awful) crumbling,
and the mountains crumbled
And the hills are ground to powder
and the mountains are totally shattered and crumble to pieces
And the mountains are crumbled, crumbled.
and the mountains are shattered into bits
And the mountains shall be crumbled to atoms,
And the mountains will be powdered to dust.
and the mountains fragmented
And the mountains are crushed and crumbled.
And the mountains are broken down, crumbling
[56:5] and the mountains are pulverised to [tiny] pieces,

(And the hills are ground to powder) and it is also said: and the hills are made to move like the passing of the clouds; and it is also said that this means: when the hills are uprooted from their spots. 639

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَبُسَّتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ بَسّاً فَكَانَتْ هَبَآءً مُّنبَثّاً } أي خُلِطتْ
 والمَبسوسُ: المَبلولُ
 والهَباءُ: الغِبارُ الذي تَراهُ من الشَّمسِ في الكُوةِ
 ويقال: الترابُ الذي يكونُ عَلى إثرِ الدَّوابِ
 والمُنبثُّ: المُتفرقُ

translations.translation:
And the mountains were leveled off, so it became level ground.


The stained one: the one who is stained


And al-haba' (the dust): the dust that you see from the sun in the sky.
 The earth that is on the back of the animals


And the one who is dispersed {i.e. the disbeliever} is the one who is far astray.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَبُسَّتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ } أي: تشتت وتفتت أجزاؤها { بَسّاً } [الواقعة: 5] تفتتاً تاماً وتشتتاً كاملاً بحيث اضمحلت أجزاؤها
 وتلاشت وصارت كالسويق الملتوت

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وبُسَّتِ الجبالُ بسًّا } أي: فُتنت حتى صارت كالسويق الملتّت
 من: بسَّ السويق: إذا لتّه
 أو: سِيقت وسُيّرت عن أماكنها
 من: بسّ الغنم: إذا ساقها
 كقوله تعالى:

[النبأ: 20]
